  • Method Details

    • include

      boolean include(ResourceAttributeFilterInterface.OptionalFHIRAttribute attribute)
      Indicates if the passed in parameter is optional true = include this parameter in every message. false = do not include this paramter in every message.

    • isMandatory

      boolean isMandatory(ResourceAttributeFilterInterface.MandatoryFHIRAttribute attribute)
      The OptionalFHIRAttribute optional selector works inversely in this situation. ie:

      parameter = providerNo - default = true - optional = true - mandatory = false

      practitionerNo = false : this value is mandatory practitionerNo = true : this value is not mandatory empty : this value is not mandatory

    • getFilter

      ResourceAttributeFilter getFilter(Class<?> targetResource)
